# TagSelectedEventArgs constructor

Create a new instance of event details for tag selection events.

```csharp
public TagSelectedEventArgs(RoutedEvent routedEvent, object source, bool is_selected)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| routedEvent | The event that was fired |
| source | The object which raised the event |
| is_selected | Flag to indicate the selection status. |
